name: Moroccan couscous
ingredients: 100 g smen (clarified butter) or regular butter
steps: Cover the meat with water and simmer over low heat for one hour.
Place the semolina in a dish, pour over 25 cl of boiling water. Mix and let rest for 30 minutes, stirring from time to time.
Add the carrots and turnips to the meat along with some parsley.
Place the semolina in the couscoussier basket and cook for 15 minutes over the pot (bottom of the couscoussier).
Cook the meat for 20 minutes, then add the zucchini and raisins. Cook for another 20 minutes.
Finally add the cilantro and cook for 10 minutes.
Once the semolina is ready, transfer it to a dish and drizzle with a glass of cold water. Fluff the grains.
Serve the semolina in a dome, with the meat and vegetables in the center, topped with broth.
